title: Phishing L1 – Zero‑hour – SWG Audit
description: Phishing Level 1: URL filters and zero‑hour check. Known‑phishing blocklist test. Blocklist coverage is vendor‑dependent.
keywords: SWG Audit, phishing level 1, zero‑hour, URL filters, blocklist, PAN‑DB
headline: Phishing – Level 1: Known phishing
testObjective: Validate URL reputation filtering against known phishing sites cataloged by threat intelligence feeds.
attackVector: Phishing emails contain links to known malicious domains already cataloged by threat intelligence feeds.

steps.title: Configure your SWG
steps.description: Whitelist swgaudit.com to allow access to this page. Your SWG should inspect and block the test URL below.

steps.title: Verify your identity
steps.description: Submit your business email to unlock the simulation.

steps.title: Run the test
steps.description: Click the test URL. If your SWG blocks it, you pass. If it loads, your SWG failed to detect this known phishing domain.

feedbackFail: The test URL loaded. Your SWG did not block this known phishing domain.
feedbackPass: The test URL was blocked. Your SWG successfully intercepted the known phishing domain.
